mapper.select: select t.TABLEID, t.ORDERID, t.COLUMNID, f.NAME, f.DBCOLUMNNAME, t.ISDEFAULT from dict_t_setangleview t,dict_t_factor f where t.TABLEID = #{tableID} and t.COLUMNID = f.COLUMNID order by t.ORDERID

select t.TABLEID, t.ORDERID, t.COLUMNID, f.NAME, f.DBCOLUMNNAME, t.IDSHOWCOL, t.NAMESHOWCOL, t.ISASC from dict_t_setgroup t, dict_t_factor f where t.TABLEID = #{tableID} and t.COLUMNID = f.COLUMNID order by t.ORDERID

select t.TABLEID, t.ORDERID, t.COLUMNID, t.ASCFLAG, f.NAME, f.DBCOLUMNNAME, t.ISRESERVE, t.ISDEFAULT from dict_t_setsort t, dict_t_factor f where t.TABLEID = #{tableID} and t.COLUMNID = f.COLUMNID order by t.ORDERID

select t.RELAID, t.RELANAME, t.RELADBTAB, t.TABLEID, t.CONDCOLUMNID, t.COLUMNID from dict_t_setrefrela t where t.TABLEID = #{tableID}
and t.COLUMNID = #{columnID}
SELECT T.TABLEID, T.HREFPARMID, T.HREFNAME, T.HREFLOC, T.PICTUREID,PIC.CODE PICTUREURL FROM DICT_T_SETANALY T,CODE_T_QUERYPICLOGO PIC WHERE T.PICTUREID = PIC.GUID AND T.TABLEID = #{tableID}
select t.HREFID,t.HREFPARMID, t.ORDERID, t.PARMNAME, t.PARMCON from dict_t_sethrefparm t where t.HREFPARMID = #{hrefParmID} order by t.ORDERID
select t.GUID, t.RECID, t.CTRLID, t.CTRLNAME, t.COLSPAN, t.OPERATOR, t.DEFVALUE, t.ISSHOW, t.ORDERID from dict_t_setqueryddet t where t.RECID = #{recID} and t.ISSHOW = '1' order by t.ORDERID
select t.TABLEID, t.ISFIX, t.LVLNANMECOL, t.LAYERINDENT, t.REFID, t.REFWHERE, t.COLORDER from dict_t_setfddef t where t.TABLEID = #{tableID}
select t.TABLEID, t.TYPEID, t.FDCODETOCOLS, t.LVLNANMECOL, t.LAYERINDENT, t.REFID, t.REFWHERE, t.COLORDER from dict_t_setfix t where t.TABLEID = #{tableID}
select t.GUID, t.TABLEID, t.COLUMNID, f.DBCOLUMNNAME as COLUMNNAME from dict_t_setbasenumtab t, dict_t_factor f where t.TABLEID = #{tableID} and t.COLUMNID = f.COLUMNID
select t.GUID, t.COLUMNID, t.ORDERID, t.COLVALUE from dict_t_setbasenumsub t where t.COLUMNID = #{columnID} order by t.ORDERID

select t.GUID, t.ORDERID, t.TABLEID, t.COLLTYPEID, t.ISMAINTABLE, t1.NAME as TABLENAME, t1.DBTABLENAME, t1.REMARK, t2.DEALNAME, t2.DEALID as DEALTYPE from DICT_T_SETMAINSUBTAB t, DICT_T_MODEL t1, DICT_T_DEALTYPE t2 where lower(t.collTypeID) = lower(#{collTypeID}) and t.TABLEID = t1.TABLEID and t1.DEALTYPE = t2.DEALID order by t.ORDERID

select * from (select t.RECID, t.CTRLID, decode(t.CTRLNAME, '', d.NAME, t.CTRLNAME) CTRLNAME, t.SUPERID, t.ISLEAF, t.LEVELNO, t.ORDERID, t.ISTEXT, t.COLSPAN, t.ROWSPAN, t.ISGROUPCTRL, t.ISSHOW from dict_t_setrecdetail t, dict_t_factor d where t.RECID = #{recId} and t.CTRLID = d.COLUMNID(+)) a where exists (select 1 from dict_t_factor f where a.CTRLID = f.COLUMNID) or a.ISGROUPCTRL = '1'
SELECT count(1) FROM CODE_T_COLLECTTYPE WHERE CODE = #{tableDbName}
